item.description:
SWING II


Tired of sitting and watching others dance and have fun at parties and weddings? Then learn to dance with us and look great on the dance floor. Come learn East Coast and West Coast Swing & enjoy the groovin' music of Pop, Rock & Swing Bands This one hour class is for dancers with some Swing experience. Partners are suggested but not necessary. Please wear comfortable clothes and shoes that can slide, no sandals. Class size is limited to 20.

Thursdays 7-8pm

$50 for a 5 class card - $12/one class

To register, please call 203.641.0691 or sign up on MeetupÂ or sign up online here

Laurent Mullen, owner

Ballroom Dancin Fools
item.how_to_find_us: Come a little early to sign up or check in.
item.name: Swing II Class
